summary: Indian stock markets declined on Friday, extending losses for the sixth consecutive session, primarily driven by a sell-off in pharmaceutical stocks. This downturn followed U.S. President Donald Trump's announcement of new tariffs, including a 100% levy on branded drugs and 25% on heavy-duty trucks, impacting market sentiment and broader indices.

title: Indian market in consolidation mode; consumption, retail banks to lead next leg of growth: Sushant Bhansali
summary: Ambit Asset Management anticipates Indian stocks may rise. Festive sales and retail loans could boost growth. Corporate earnings are expected to recover. Sushant Bhansali notes current market consolidation. He predicts Q3 earnings will improve. Domestic sectors like autos are favored. Retail banks are well-positioned. Foreign investor interest in India is growing. A strong market is expected by 2026.

title: Seshaasai Technologies IPO allotment likely today. Check status, GMP, refund, listing and other details
summary: Investors await the Seshaasai Technologies IPO share allotment, expected today. Applicants can check their status on the NSE/BSE or MUFG Intime website. Refunds and demat credit are scheduled for September 29, 2025. Listing is set for September 30. The IPO saw strong subscription rates across all investor categories. The company plans to use the funds for expansion and debt reduction.

title: Saatvik Green Energy shares list at 1% discount to IPO price on exchanges
summary: Saatvik Green Energy had a flat listing on the exchanges, debuting at Rs 465 on NSE and slightly lower on BSE. The IPO, which raised Rs 900 crore, was subscribed nearly seven times, driven by institutional investors.

title: GK Energy shares debut at 12% premium over IPO price
summary: GK Energy shares debuted with a premium, listing at Rs 171 on NSE and Rs 165 on BSE against an IPO price of Rs 153, driven by strong investor demand that oversubscribed the Rs 464 crore IPO by 93.6 times.

title: Jaro Education IPO allotment likely today. Check status, GMP, refund, listing and other details
summary: The allotment of shares for Jaro Education’s ₹450 crore IPO is expected to be finalized today. Investors who applied for the issue can check their status online via the BSE, NSE, or registrar Bigshare Services. The shares will be credited to demat accounts by September 29, with listing scheduled on September 30, where the issue is expected to debut at a premium.

title: Anand Rathi Share IPO allotment: Here’s how to check status as GMP stays modest
summary: Anand Rathi Share and Stock Brokers’ ₹745 crore IPO allotment will be finalized on Friday, with shares listing on NSE and BSE on September 30.

title: India’s options crackdown gives 150-year-old bourse surprise win
summary: BSE is gaining ground in India’s derivatives market after SEBI’s crackdown reshaped weekly expiries. By shifting its contracts to Thursdays, the 150-year-old exchange has captured traders’ attention, challenging NSE’s long-held dominance. While liquidity hurdles remain, BSE’s rising turnover on expiry days signals a shift in market dynamics that could redefine competition in derivatives trading.

title: Solarworld Energy Solutions IPO allotment likely today. Check status, GMP and other details
summary: Solarworld Energy Solutions’ ₹490 crore IPO saw strong demand with 68.5x subscription; allotment will be finalized on Friday, ahead of listing on NSE and BSE on September 30.
